title: News About Malia Obama – Barack Did it to Her!
text:
By economic news
Monday, January 22, 2018 22:33
 
It’s difficult to parse out just what will be the legacy that Obama leaves behind. It could be any number of things; the Affordable Care Act (aka Obamacare) was a huge pet project, as was arming Muslim majority nations who want to kill the United States. Growing the government and overburdening the welfare system was also a huge move on the part of Democrats while Obama was in office. But when we look back on the 8 years as a whole, one of the biggest things to stick out is the way he once again set racism on fire.
One might think that being a mixed race person himself he would want peace among the two races that he could reasonably claim, but that just didn’t seem to be the case. With the help of his very empowered black wife, President Obama lit up America with overtly racist sentiments, and like any good wildfire, it’s now burning completely out of control.
They might have thought that what they were doing would only be good for their family. After all, they all identified as black people, and the fire of racism was fueled by black Americans who wanted more than what they’d been given. They apparently didn’t look far enough into the future to see that one of their daughters might just want to go out with a person who wasn’t black. Or maybe it was the other way around, and as teenagers sometimes do, his daughter saw what her daddy hated the most and decided to take it out on a date just to make him mad. Either way, Malia Obama has found herself in the middle of a hailstorm of her dad’s own making after beginning to date a white boy while in college.
